Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content

Class ContentReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • System.IO.BinaryReader
      • Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.ContentReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable

    public final class ContentReader
extends BinaryReader
    A worker object that implements most of ContentManager.Load. A new ContentReader is constructed for each asset loaded.
    Author:
    Halofreak1990
